@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@

@@ -211,1 +211,3 @@
-        writeInt(def.getTotalIn(), buf, offset + 4); // Number of uncompr. bytes
+        // RFC 1952: Size of the original (uncompressed) input data modulo 2^32
+        int iSize = (int) def.getBytesRead();
+        writeInt(iSize, buf, offset + 4);
